  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114097</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114097</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Induced current flowing through a conducting wire in a magnetic field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der geverursachte Strom, der eine Leitleitung in 
einem magnetischem durchfließt, fangen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courant induit traversant un fil de conduite dans 
un champ magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corrente induzida que corre através de um fio 
conduzindo em um campo magnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corrente indotta che attraversa un legare di 
condotta in un campo magnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προκληθείσα παρούσα ροή ενός καλωδίου διεύθυνσης σε 
ένα μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corriente inducida que atraviesa un alambre que 
conduce en un campo magnético</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the incorrect (a) and correct (b)  directions of induced current flowing in the wire and motor effect force when it is moved downward a magnetic field generated by a magnet.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conducting wires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">induced current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motor effect force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht das falsche (a) und 
korrekte (b) Richtungen des geverursachten aktuellen Fließens in die 
Leitung und Bewegungseffektkraft, wenn es abwärts ein magnetisches 
verschoben wird, fangen festgelegt durch einen Magneten auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare le (a) incorrect et (b)
les directions correctes de l'entrée actuelle induite dans la force 
d'effet de fil et de moteur quand c'est descendu un champ magnétique 
produit par un aimant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara o (a) incorreto e (b) 
os sentidos corretos de fluir atual induzido na força do efeito do 
fio e do motor quando é movido para baixo um campo magnético gerado 
por um ímã.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta il (a) errato e 
(b) i sensi corretti di entrare corrente indotto nella forza di 
effetto del motore e del legare quando è sceso un campo magnetico 
generato da un magnete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει το ανακριβές (α) και τις 
σωστές (β) κατευθύνσεις της προκληθείσας παρούσας ροής στη 
δύναμη επίδρασης καλωδίων και μηχανών όταν κινείται προς τα 
κάτω ένα μαγνητικό πεδίο που παράγεται από έναν μαγνήτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara el (a) incorrecto y (b) 
las direcciones correctas de fluir actual inducido en la fuerza del 
efecto del alambre y del motor cuando se mueve hacia abajo un campo 
magnético generado por un imán.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leitleitungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geverursachter Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magneten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegungseffektkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fils de conduite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">courant induit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">aimants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force d'effet de moteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fios conduzindo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corrente induzida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ímãs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força do efeito do motor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legare di condotta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corrente indotta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">magneti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza di effetto del motore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διεύθυνση των καλωδίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προκληθέν ρεύμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνήτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δύναμη επίδρασης μηχανών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">alambres que conducen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">corriente inducida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza del efecto del motor</string>
          </keyword>
